snippet.title: Mr. Cheesy - Official Ludum Dare 46 Presentation Trailer
snippet.description:
Mr. Cheesy is a Special Project developed in under 72h!  🧀
It is a game made only by one solo developer for the Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam!

💙 Follow Mr. Cheesy on his brand new Facebook Page for frequent updates and further development/features: https://www.facebook.com/mrcheesy

Game Mechanics:
Slide down that Cheese Grater and since the theme of  Ludum Dare 46 is "Keep it alive"...try not to end up on that Spaghett! 🍝

* Move with left/right arrow keys or A/D buttons

🧀 Play Now for FREE: https://savvu-games.itch.io/mr-cheesy 

🧀 Get it on Android: https://bit.ly/MrCheesyMobile

Thanks for playing "Mr. Cheesy" and for showing your support on my first Ludum Dare Game Jam!🙏
Competition Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/$190298

Choose your Membership Level and get exclusive benefits from the Channel!
🥇 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/gamedevel

Or buy me a fine cup of coffee to boost my motivation (need caffeine!)
☕ https://www.buymeacoffee.com/SavvuGameDevel

Thank you :D

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
👋 Discord: https://discord.gg/Y94dNVFJmD

🔔 Don't click here!: http://bit.ly/savvulink

💚 GooglePlay: http://bit.ly/SAVVUgamepage
💛 Itch.io: https://savvu-games.itch.io

🌐 Website: https://savvugames.com
💜 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/savvugames/
💙 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/savvugames
🖤 Twitter: https://twitter.com/savvugames

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#savvu #mrcheesy #ludumdare #gamedevelopment #gamejam #indiedeveloper
